filmography.title: The Country Girl
filmography.role_description: The long-suffering, dowdy wife of an alcoholic has-been actor who struggles to manage his career and his insecurities.
filmography.plot: A director hires an alcoholic actor for a new musical, but the actor's wife becomes the target of the director's suspicion and eventual affection.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: Mogambo
filmography.role_description: A proper, married Englishwoman on safari who finds herself in a passionate love triangle with a rugged big-game hunter.
filmography.plot: On a Kenyan safari, a white hunter finds himself torn between a sultry showgirl and a prim, married anthropologist.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: High Noon
filmography.role_description: A devout Quaker pacifist who is torn between her religious beliefs and her love for her new husband as he faces a deadly gang alone.
filmography.plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon.

filmography.title: Dial M for Murder
filmography.role_description: A wealthy London socialite whose husband discovers her affair and blackmails an old acquaintance into murdering her.
filmography.plot: A former tennis pro arranges the murder of his adulterous wife, but when his plan goes wrong, he improvises a way to get her convicted of the crime instead.

filmography.title: Rear Window
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated, high-fashion socialite who proves her mettle by helping her wheelchair-bound boyfriend investigate a potential murder across the courtyard.
filmography.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

filmography.title: To Catch a Thief
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, elegant American heiress vacationing on the French Riviera who sets out to seduce a retired cat burglar.
filmography.plot: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

filmography.title: High Society
filmography.role_description: A headstrong, wealthy Newport socialite whose upcoming wedding is complicated by the arrival of her ex-husband and a reporter.
filmography.plot: A spoiled heiress, planning to marry a stuffy man, is surprised by the arrival of her ex-husband and a tabloid reporter.

filmography.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
filmography.role_description: The supportive but worried wife of a naval reservist pilot who must come to terms with the dangers her husband faces in the Korean War.
filmography.plot: A Navy pilot redeploys to fight in the Korean War and must bomb a set of highly defended bridges.

filmography.title: The Swan
filmography.role_description: A graceful young princess who is being groomed to marry a crown prince but finds herself drawn to her brothers' tutor.
filmography.plot: A princess is urged by her mother to marry her cousin, a crown prince, but her heart wavers toward the handsome tutor.

filmography.title: Fourteen Hours
filmography.role_description: A young woman in a lawyer's office who becomes an onlooker to the unfolding drama of a man threatening suicide.
filmography.plot: A police officer tries to talk a desperate man down from the ledge of a high-rise building.
